session_summary: Jolene and Deborah caught up at 9:11 am on 21 August, 2023. They discussed memories, appreciating the simple things in life, and finding balance through yoga and meditation. Deborah shared her moments of nostalgia and how she cherishes flowers in memory of her mom. Jolene mentioned her love for savasana in yoga. They both emphasized the importance of slowing down to appreciate life's small joys. The conversation ended with well wishes for each other to stay connected.

conversation_turns.speaker: Jolene
conversation_turns.text: Long time no talk! We were given a new game for the console last week, it is Battlefield 1. What's been up with you?

conversation_turns.speaker: Deborah
conversation_turns.blip_caption: a photo of a flower cart on a sidewalk with flowers in it
conversation_turns.text: Hey Jolene! Good to hear from you. That`s cool! Been thinking about a few big moments lately - went to a place that held a lot of memories for me. Sat on a bench where we used to chat and it brought back a lot of emotions.

conversation_turns.speaker: Jolene
conversation_turns.text: Mostly happy or a bit of everything?

conversation_turns.speaker: Deborah
conversation_turns.blip_caption: a photo of a vase of flowers on the ground in a street
conversation_turns.text: It was quite a mix, Jolene. I felt nostalgia and longing, but also grateful for the memories. It's amazing how a place can mean so much. I brought these flowers there.

conversation_turns.speaker: Jolene
conversation_turns.text: Do you think she would like it?

conversation_turns.speaker: Deborah
conversation_turns.blip_caption: a photo of a woman holding a bouquet of red roses
conversation_turns.text: Yeah, my mom really loved flowers. They always made her so happy. She appreciated the simple things in life.

conversation_turns.speaker: Jolene
conversation_turns.text: Wow, that's a great photo! How did she show you to appreciate it?

conversation_turns.speaker: Deborah
conversation_turns.text: By taking it slow, seeing beauty in them, and finding joy.

conversation_turns.speaker: Jolene
conversation_turns.text: Wow Deb, that's awesome! We should definitely take time to enjoy that and not let the business of life cause us to miss out on the good stuff.

conversation_turns.speaker: Deborah
conversation_turns.text: Yeah, Jolene. Life can be so busy that we often overlook the small things that truly matter. Let's make an effort to appreciate them more.

conversation_turns.speaker: Jolene
conversation_turns.text: Yep Deb, slowing down and enjoying simple moments can bring a lot of balance and happiness. I'm trying to do more yoga and meditation myself to help relax and stay focused. Are there any calming habits that you practice to feel balanced?

conversation_turns.speaker: Deborah
conversation_turns.blip_caption: a photo of a sunset over a body of water
conversation_turns.text: Yeah, same here, Jolene! Yoga and meditation help me find balance and inner peace. Going out for walks and staying mindful also keep me grounded. I take similar photos on walks.

conversation_turns.speaker: Jolene
conversation_turns.text: Gorgeous! Going for a walk and feeling so peaceful must be amazing.

conversation_turns.speaker: Deborah
conversation_turns.text: Moments like that I'll always cherish.

conversation_turns.speaker: Jolene
conversation_turns.text: That calm and peaceful feeling is so nice - it's great for recharging and thinking.

conversation_turns.speaker: Deborah
conversation_turns.text: It's like a reboot for me.

conversation_turns.speaker: Jolene
conversation_turns.blip_caption: a photo of a green cushion on a floor in front of a window
conversation_turns.text: Got it! It's like hitting the refresh button and coming back even better.

conversation_turns.speaker: Deborah
conversation_turns.text: What's your favorite yoga pose for some rest?

conversation_turns.speaker: Jolene
conversation_turns.blip_caption: a photo of a person laying on the floor with a paper bag
conversation_turns.text: I'm a fan of savasana - aka the corpse pose. It's so calming and helps me just let go and surrender.

conversation_turns.speaker: Deborah
conversation_turns.text: Funny photo! How long have you been doing yoga?

conversation_turns.speaker: Jolene
conversation_turns.text: Been doing it for 3 years. It's a great way to escape studying and work stress.

conversation_turns.speaker: Deborah
conversation_turns.text: Wow, Jolene! Taking time to unwind is key and that seems just right for you!

conversation_turns.speaker: Jolene
conversation_turns.text: I'm really finding my zen again!

conversation_turns.speaker: Deborah
conversation_turns.text: Keep it up!

conversation_turns.speaker: Jolene
conversation_turns.text: Thanks for your support, Deb!

conversation_turns.speaker: Deborah
conversation_turns.text: Good luck with everything. Stay in touch.

Deborah: Deborah visits the bench where she and her mother used to have chats and revisits some nostalgic memories.
Jolene: Jolene and her partner attempt to play Battlefield 1 on the new game console she bought as a gift for her partner.
Jolene received a new game called Battlefield 1 for her console last week.
Jolene practices yoga and meditation to relax and stay focused.
Jolene has been doing yoga for 3 years as a way to escape studying and work stress.
Deborah: Deborah went to a place that held a lot of memories for her.
Deborah felt nostalgia, longing, and grateful for memories when visiting a place that held memories.
Deborah's mom loved flowers, and they always made her happy.
Deborah practices yoga and meditation to find balance and inner peace.
